title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
overview: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast chronicles the notorious drug syndicate, the Black Mafia Family. The series will feature exclusive audio excerpts from founding member, Demetrius Flenory, in addition to interviews with members of his family, former BMF members and celebrity insiders including Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, T.I., 2 Chainz, and White Boy Rick.Â
